metadata.title: CVE-2022-26716 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in tvOS 15.5, iOS 15.5 and iPadOS 15.5, watchOS 8.6,macOS Monterey 12.4, Safari 15.5. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.36.3-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
